xwikidoc.content: <marta> has joined #medsavant 07:25 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 08:29 <bvancea> hey sdumitiru 08:29 <bvancea> sdumitriu* 09:37 <sdumitriu> Hey bvancea 09:39 <bvancea> how are you? 09:39 <sdumitriu> Tired 09:39 <sdumitriu> I need a vacation 09:39 <bvancea> hehe 09:40 <bvancea> when was the last time you had a vacation? 09:49 <sdumitriu> 2009? 09:50 <bvancea> wow 09:50 <bvancea> props to you for lasting so long 11:23 <sdumitriu> So, how's it going? 11:23 <sdumitriu> Done with the thesis rewrite? 11:27 <bvancea> yup, I've send it to the advisor 11:28 <bvancea> I'm working on that abstraction layer now 11:29 <bvancea> if I manage to finish that up and set up debugging for the new generated project version 11:29 <bvancea> I'll consider it a productive weekened 11:29 <bvancea> weekend* 11:30 <bvancea> I also had the final graduation festivity this morning :) 11:30 <bvancea> I'm not sure why my university likes to hold 2 separate graduation festivities 11:30 <bvancea> a lot of redundancy imo 11:34 <bvancea> I mean there's a festivity with all the faculties at the university, and there's the festivity with my year only 12:42 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 13:36 <bvancea> so I have a question 13:37 <bvancea> after we would create a query object 13:37 <bvancea> and populate it with parameters, etc 13:37 <bvancea> and query.execute() is called 13:38 <bvancea> the object should have delegate the execution of the query to a QueryExecutor (I'm using the terminology from XWiki) 13:38 <bvancea> how are we going to do that? 13:39 <bvancea> I can only think of using dependency injection to inject a query executor into queries 13:39 <bvancea> or just singleton query executors 13:39 <bvancea> and have the query implementations call them 14:37 <bvancea> I create a new issue for the code I've been working on 14:37 <bvancea> hopefully the name is descriptive enough 14:41 <sdumitriu> bvancea: Sorry, I was talking with somebody 14:41 <bvancea> its okay 14:41 <bvancea> its saturday anyway 14:41 <bvancea> :) 14:41 <sdumitriu> So yes, the QueryExecutor is the one that will be different: SolrQueryExecutor, ICEQueryExecutor 14:42 <bvancea> I see 14:42 <sdumitriu> DI would be a good idea, except that MedSavant doesn't have one 14:42 <sdumitriu> So the next best idea is to use a Factory 14:42 <sdumitriu> Which uses a simple if..else based on a text configuration file 14:43 <sdumitriu> It's not that pretty, but it works 14:43 <bvancea> hmm 14:44 <bvancea> so the factory would read the classname for that executor and instantiate one? 14:44 <bvancea> from the config file I mean 14:45 <sdumitriu> Reflection is one idea, indeed 14:45 <sdumitriu> And it's more scalable 14:46 <bvancea> cool 14:46 <bvancea> what exactly do you mean by more scalable though? 14:47 <sdumitriu> What I said was to just have an if (configuration.engine == "solr") then executor = new SolrQueryExector() else executor = new IceQueryExecutor() 14:47 <sdumitriu> Which isn't scalable 14:49 <bvancea> I understand 14:49 <bvancea> but why exactly is reflection more scalable? 14:49 <sdumitriu> If we add a new query executor, we don't need to change the if 14:50 <sdumitriu> It's enough to include a new jar in the classpath and set the right classname in the configuration 14:50 <bvancea> hm, yes 14:50 <bvancea> :D 14:51 <bvancea> thats was better 14:52 <bvancea> that's way better* 15:21 <bvancea> http://www.ohloh.net/orgs/apache/projects?query=&sort=committer_count 15:21 <bvancea> we were talking a few days ago about commiters on apache 15:22 <bvancea> I wonder how accurate that page is 15:33 <sdumitriu> Well, that column shows only committers active in the last 12 months, not all time 15:34 <sdumitriu> And there's an important difference to take into account: git shows authors, SVN shows committers 15:34 <sdumitriu> Which varies gratly 15:34 <sdumitriu> greatly 15:37 <sdumitriu> You should set a real usename on your local git 15:37 <sdumitriu> Not Xenosky 16:05 <bvancea> yeah, sorry about that 16:05 <bvancea> I do have it set though 16:05 <bvancea> but I think the IDE overwrites it 16:05 <bvancea> not sure why
